titlestmt.titleproper: Guide the Brooklyn celebrities photography collection V1990.012
titlestmt.author: Weatherly Stephan
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:41:41 +0000.

did.abstract: Six items, including photographs and one postcard, dated circa 1970 to 1990. Images in the collection show celebrities born in Brooklyn, N.Y., including Woody Allen, Neil Diamond, Malcolm Forbes, and Eddie Murphy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Six items, including photographs and one postcard, dated circa 1970 to 1990. Images in the collection show celebrities born in Brooklyn, N.Y., including Woody Allen, Neil Diamond, Malcolm Forbes, and Eddie Murphy.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Based on the date range of this collection, all items will enter the public domain by 2110. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn celebrities photography collection, V1990.012, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Fully processed to the item level.
